WorkItem.Description:
When using ViewModelLocator.AutoWireViewModel I am getting "Your views must implement IView" design time error even though the views implement IView

I am using VS2013 Update 2
WorkItem.Summary: Prism 5 WPF XAML designer error "Your views must implement IView"

Comments.Message: This is still there in Update 3, and Visual Studio 2015 Preview.
This is still there in Update 4, and Visual Studio 2015 Preview.
